title: Is there a link between the major hurricanes and 29 August?
subtitle: Mimi Al-Virgi falsely states that four hurricanes struck the United States on 29 August in different years, leading to false allegations about this "type."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Four major hurricanes hit the United States on 29 August, over a period of 12 years, which constituted a meaningful pattern.
